body:
From your picture i see that the simulation was performed fine. But from what you wrote it doesn't (but just manually).

You are not supposedly to run manually anyways.

You need E+ 8.1 (!!). See the bat file you attached previously and you'll see that the bat is looking for the 8.1 directory. HB is not yet supporting 8.3 (Chris or Mostapha correct me if i'm wrong). I myself have both versions installed.

-A.
